_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
December 2, 4:30 PM
The Tuesday turns sponsored by the 6-9" that fell today led to an awesome time on the hill. Oh, and the flakes haven't stopped falling yet, we'll see what tomorrow brings for totals. We plan to have 11 trails open across the mountain, offering over 62 skiable acres with sunshine and temps in the 20s, and assessments planned for natural terrain with potential trail openings in the morning. Not only that, snowmakers continue to push forward for terrain expansion where we anticipate opening up some trails on the Gate House side by the weekend. The new snow has helped soften terrain but there's still some firmness underneath. Ski with care doing early season conditions. We have a groomed top-to-bottom route available through Jester, Murphys Glades, Heavens Gate Traverse, Lower Jester, and Gondolier, these are only accessible via advanced trails only. First Time is now open for Ski and Ride Lessons, currently hike only. ALL LIFT ACCESSED TERRAIN IS FOR ADVANCED RIDERS. All this good news have you dreaming of a visit? Grab a TBD ticket for just $99 and ski any day during the 25/26 winter season. No restrictions. The only catch, you must purchase before 12/5.

Super Bravo Quad spins from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM, and Heavens Gate Quad runs from 9:00 AM to 3:45 PM. Looking for park laps? Mt. Ellen currently has 15 features set up, and the hike park is open from 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM for passholders.

Ready for more than turns? Join us Dec. 6th for live music with Soul Rebel Project at Castlerock Pub (1:304:30 PM). Starting Dec. 6th through Friday Dec. 12th, kids 12 and under ski and ride for free at Sugarbush. Whether your little ones are just starting out or already shredding, this is the perfect time to plan your trip to the mountain. Check out all of our winter events.

Have an Ikon Base Pass? Come ski before 12/25 and earn a voucher for an unrestricted lift ticket for yourself to be used any day here for the rest of the season. Grab up to five of these tickets simply by skiing and riding here before Christmas. Don't miss out on all of our deals including 50% off December lodging through December 26th.

As a reminder, please no uphill travel at this time, as mountain operations are ongoing at both mountains. We will announce uphill travel opening during the season when we have sufficient terrain to do so.
